infovis.table
Class TableProxy

java.lang.Object
  infovis.column.AbstractColumn
      infovis.column.ColumnProxy
          infovis.table.TableProxy
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChangeListener, Column, Constants, EventListener, cern.colt.function.IntComparator, Metadata, RowComparator, Serializable, Table, TableModel, TableModelListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefaultVisualization, DynamicTableProxy, FilteredTable
public class TableProxy
extends ColumnProxy
implements Table, TableModelListener

A Table Proxy implements an Table by forwarding all the methods to an internal Table.

This class is useful to implements higher level containers out of a standard DefaultTable.

Version:
$Revision: 1.20 $
Author:
Jean-Daniel Fekete
See Also:
Serialized Form

clear

public void clear()
Description copied from interface: Table
Clears the table.

After this method, the table is almost in the same state as if it had been created afresh except it contains the same columns as before but they are all cleared.

Specified by:
clear in interface Table
Overrides:
clear in class ColumnProxy
See Also:
Table.clear()
